scenario_text.value:
Hm? I think I see Kaito and Dracumon over
there.

I wonder what they’re talking about. They
both seem kind of intense.

You shouldn’t get so worked up about this,
Kaito. It’s not like it’ll do you any good.

But how can I help worrying?! This is my
little sister we’re talking about!
(Yep, sounds serious all right.)

Hm? Who’s there?! Come on out and show
yourself!
Or face the consequences!

Hey! It’s just me! I’m sorry, I didn’t mean
to eavesdrop.
So, you overheard us, Takuma?

Well, I didn’t hear everything. You mentioned
your little sister so...this is about Miu?

Yes. Miu is very important to me. She’s the
only sister I’ve got. You get that, right?
If anything were to happen to her, I...

I’m telling you, Kaito, you’re letting this
get to you too much. Try not to be so tense.

Takuma, help me convince him, would you? He
can’t go on like this.
Kaito, I know how you feel, but...
You shouldn’t obsess.
Miu can handle herself.
Losing it won’t help.
You shouldn’t obsess over this.

How can I not? Especially when the more
I hear not to worry, the more it bothers me.

I mean, you get it, right, Takuma? In a place
like this, you’d worry about your family.

And no matter how you look at it, Miu has got
to be terrified.

I’m her big brother. I’m the only one she can
count on in all this.

I need to keep her safe, no matter what. I am
not going to let her down this time!

(“This time”? Sounds like something’s
happened between them in the past.)

(This doesn’t really seem like the time to
ask about it, though.)

Miu can handle herself, okay? She’s a lot
more capable than you realize.

What do you know?! Do you have any idea how
much I...

How important she is to me? ...Sorry.
I didn’t mean to scream like that.

It’s not like yelling at you will help
anything. I just got so upset...
(Kaito...)
Miu...means a lot to me, okay?

And look where we are. I just can’t help but
worry about her.

Losing it won’t help. The first thing you
need to do is calm down.
Takuma...!

No, I know you’re right. I’m sorry, but you
get it, don’t you?

I’m just so worried about Miu. I can’t help
it.
(I didn’t realize Kaito was so concerned.)

(I should do something to help take his mind
off things so he doesn’t get so worried.)
